means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 弗伦德绰号，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“朋友”(friend)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"朋友"之意。
means: friend ： 一般用词，指某人喜爱并乐意与之相交往的人。
mate ： 最普通用词，既可指好友、同事，又可指合伙人，还可指配偶的一方。
acquaintance ： 指彼此相识，但交往不甚密切，相互间没有深厚情感的人。
pal ： 口语用词，指十分要好的朋友。

jx.jx_en_mean: be (or become) on good or affectionate terms with (someone)
a person in a position to use their influence on one's behalf

phrase.cizu_name: a friend in need is a friend indeed

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)a person who helps at a difficult time is a person who you can really rely on
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)患难中的朋友才是真朋友

jx.jx_en_mean: people in senior positions who are able and willing to use their influence on one's behalf
jx.jx_cn_mean: 势力很大的朋友，强大的靠山

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit.)used to address or refer to another member of one's own party in the House of Commons
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英)我尊敬的朋友（议员在下院中称呼或提到本党另一成员时的用语）

jx.jx_en_mean: used by a barrister or lawyer in court to address or refer to another barrister or lawyer
jx.jx_cn_mean: 我渊博的同行（律师在法庭上称呼或提到另一律师时的用语）

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit.)used to address or refer to another member of one's own party in the House of Lords
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英)我高贵的朋友（议员在上院中称呼或提到本党另一成员时的用语）

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit.)used to address or refer to another member of one's own party in the House of Commons who is also a privy counselor
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英)我德高望重的朋友（议员在下院中称呼或提到担任枢密院官员的本党成员的用语）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English frēond, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch vriend and German Freund, from an Indo-European root meaning 'to love', shared by free

entry.def: A friend is someone who you know well and like, but who is not related to you.

example.ex: I had a long talk about this with my best friend...
example.tran: 我和我最好的朋友就此事进行了长谈。

example.ex: She never was a close friend of mine.
example.tran: 她从来就不是我的密友。

entry.def: If you are friends with someone, you are their friend and they are yours.

example.ex: I still wanted to be friends with Alison...
example.tran: 我还是想和艾莉森做朋友。

entry.def: The friends of a country, cause, organization, or a famous politician are the people and organizations who help and support them.

example.tran: 伯明翰皇家芭蕾舞团赞助者协会

entry.def: If one country refers to another as a friend, they mean that the other country is not an enemy of theirs.

example.ex: The president said that Japan is now a friend and international partner.
example.tran: 总统说日本现在是盟友和国际合作伙伴。

entry.def: If you make friends with someone, you begin a friendship with them. You can also say that two people make friends .

example.ex: He has made friends with the kids on the street...
example.tran: 他和流浪街头的孩子交上了朋友。
丹尼斯很容易就能交到朋友。

means.word_mean: 1. a person you know well and regard with affection and trust;

sentences.sentence: "he was my best friend at the university"

means.word_mean: 3. a person with whom you are acquainted;

sentences.sentence: "I have trouble remembering the names of all my acquaintances"

means.word_mean: 4. a person who backs a politician or a team etc.;

sentences.sentence: "all their supporters came out for the game"

auth_sentence.content: I have been speaking to my friend in Portugal.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have been speaking to my friend in Portugal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have been speaking to my friend in Portugal.

auth_sentence.content: England My friend has green fingers.she has big garden.
auth_sentence.res_content: England My friend has green fingers.she has big garden.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: England My friend has green fingers.she has big garden.

auth_sentence.content: My horrified student friend was a case in point.
auth_sentence.res_content: My horrified student friend was a case in point.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My horrified student friend was a case in point.

Sentence.sentence: For example, if a little boy's male friends are punished for crying, he will learn that "boys don't cry.
Friendships are not made in a day, and the computer would be more acceptable as a friend if it simulated the gradual changes that occur when one person is getting to know another.
Her mother is a friend of Prof. Smith's.

sentences.en: He saluted his friends with a wave of the hand.
sentences.cn: 他挥手向他的朋友致意。

sentences.en: Have you made friends with your new neighbours?
sentences.cn: 你与你的新邻居交上朋友了吗?

means.word_mean: 同胞; 自己人, 同盟者，同伙，同志

sentences.en: We are friends of labour movement.
sentences.cn: 我们是工人运动的支持者。

means.word_mean: 资助者, 捐助者，赞助者，支持者

sentences.en: The new chemistry lab was paid for by friends of the college.
sentences.cn: 新的化学实验室是由学院的资助者出钱建的。

jushi.english: She has shown her new ring to her friends.
jushi.chinese: 她让朋友们看自己的新戒指。
“我们和中国是朋友,”她回答说。

jushi.english: He saluted his friends with a wave of the hand.
jushi.chinese: 他挥手向他的朋友致意。
